description: The slim-fit Men’s Summit Series FUTUREFLEECE™ LT ½-Zip features a low-pile version of our full-loop fabric technology that helps minimize weight and optimize body temperature. It’s designed to be worn over a base layer or under whatever insulation the mission calls for. Under-pack comfort is also prioritized with flat-locked stitching and no shoulder seams.
name: The North Face Summit FutureFleece LT 1/2 Zip - Mens
